s, t = input(), input()
i, j = len(s) - 1, len(t) - 1
x = 0
while i != -1 and j != -1:
    if s[i] != t[j]:
        break
    x += 1
    i -= 1
    j -= 1

print(len(s) + len(t) - 2 * x)
